title: [DivX - ITA] La Grande Strada Azzurra [Gillo Pontecorvo - 1957].
description:
First film from Gillo Pontecorvo (1957). I got the .avi from here http://www.rebeldemule.org/foro/monograf/tema972.html - unfortunately it is not easy to get Pontecorvo's films,so I am trying to help who could be interested in this great italian director.

FROM IMDB: SquarciÃƒÂ², a fisherman, lives with his family on a small island off the Dalmatian coast of Italy. Like his fellow villagers, SquarciÃƒÂ² struggles against harsh living conditions, a scarcity of fish in nearby waters and exploitation by the local wholesaler. But while the other fishermen continue to use nets, he goes out to the open sea to fish illegally with bombs. But SquarciÃƒÂ² borrows money, loses his boat, and in a moment of supreme desperation, has to bomb directly off-shore, causing the hatred and rejection of his fellow fishermen. Trying to save his family, SquarciÃƒÂ² and his young sons sail their new boat out beyond the local waters and bomb-fish again. But this time, the sea exacts a terrible toll...
